extension.name: mod_menuwalk
extension.author: Galcedion
extension.description: Module to navigate the current (sub)menu from within the page content.

field.name: g_class
field.label: CSS classname of entry point
field.description: Entry CSS class name for the displayed module.

field.name: s_main_buttons_text
field.label: Navigation button settings
field.description: Select which buttons should appear. Please be aware that buttons will not be displayed when they would lead to a non-existing page or to the current page. At least one button must be selected.

field.name: enable_menu_count
field.label: Menu number on button
field.description: Show the number of the menu entry on the button.

field.name: enable_menu_title
field.label: Menu title on button
field.description: Show the title of the menu entry on the button.

field.name: enable_fontawesome
field.label: Fontawesome Icons
field.description: Use Fontawesome Icons to display button functionality.

field.name: enable_bootstrap
field.label: Bootstrap CSS
field.description: Use Bootstrap for styling of the module content. Disabling Bootstrap will remove the default styling.

field.name: custom_css
field.label: Custom CSS
field.description: Additional CSS for module pages. Entry point is a div with the above class name. Within is a div for each button with an a element (given the button is available).
